aerilate.name: Aerilate
aerilate.description: Turns all of this Pokemon's Normal-typed attacks into Flying-type and deals 1.3x damage. Does not affect Hidden Power.

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.description: Deals 25% damage when KOed by contact damage.

analytic.name: Analytic
analytic.description: Raises the power of all moves by 30% if the wielder moves last.

anger_point.name: Anger Point
anger_point.description: Raises Attack to +6 if struck by a critical hit.

anticipation.name: Anticipation
anticipation.description: Alerts the Pokemon of certain dangerous moves.

arena_trap.name: Arena Trap
arena_trap.description: Prevents switching and increases wild encounter rate.

aroma_veil.name: Aroma Veil
aroma_veil.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

aura_break.name: Aura Break
aura_break.description: Reverses the effects of Dark Aura and Fairy Aura.

bad_dreams.name: Bad Dreams
bad_dreams.description: Deals 1d4 damage to sleeping opponents per turn.

ball_fetch.name: Ball Fetch
ball_fetch.description: Retrieves an Apricot from a failed throw.

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: Raises power of teammates' Special moves by 1d4.

beast_boost.name: Beast Boost
beast_boost.description: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.description: Raises Special Attack mod by +3 when HP drops below half.

big_pecks.name: Big Pecks
big_pecks.description: The wielder's Defense cannot be lowered.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.description: Boosts power of Fire-type moves 1DD when at 1/3 of max HP or less.

bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.description: This Pokemon is protected from some Ball and Bomb moves.

cheek_pouch.name: Cheek Pouch
cheek_pouch.description: Increases HP when this Pokemon consumes a berry.

chilling_neigh.name: Chilling Neigh
chilling_neigh.description: Boosts Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

clear_body.name: Clear Body
clear_body.description: Stops the enemy from lowering this Pokemon's stats.

color_change.name: Color Change
color_change.description: Changes user's type to type of last attack that hit this Pokemon.

comatose.name: Comatose
comatose.description: The Pokémon is always asleep but can still attack.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.description: Raises the user's Special Attack stat by two stages when a stat is lowered, including the Special Attack stat. This does not include self-induced stat drops like those from Close Combat.

compound_eyes.name: Compound Eyes
compound_eyes.description: Raises accuracy by 30% and increases the probability of wild Pokemon holding items.

contrary.name: Contrary
contrary.description: The wielder's stat changes are reversed.

corrosion.name: Corrosion
corrosion.description: The Pokémon can poison Steel and Poison types.

cursed_body.name: Cursed Body
cursed_body.description: The wielder has a 30% chance to disable any move that hits it. 8-10 on CD

cute_charm.name: Cute Charm
cute_charm.description: Can infatuate Pokemon of opposite gender (9-10 CD) when struck and increases their wild encounter rate.

damp.name: Damp
damp.description: Prevents the use of Self-Destruct or Explosion.

dark_aura.name: Dark Aura
dark_aura.description: Increases the power of all Dark-type moves in battle (+1d6).

dazzling.name: Dazzling
dazzling.description: Protects the Pokémon from high-priority moves.

defeatist.name: Defeatist
defeatist.description: Halves the wielder's Attack and Special Attack if its HP drops below 50%.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.description: Boosts Attack by two stages for every stat drop.

delta_stream.name: Delta Stream
delta_stream.description: Summons Strong Winds until Pokemon leaves battle. Electric/Ice/Rock moves do half damage and Weather changing moves/abilities fail, except for Primordial Sea and Desolate Land.

desolate_land.name: Desolate Land
desolate_land.description: Summons Heavy Sun until Pokemon leaves battle. Water-type moves and weather changing moves/abilities fail, except for Primordial Sea and Delta Stream.

download.name: Download
download.description: User gets a stat boost depending on its opponent's stats.

dry_skin.name: Dry Skin
dry_skin.description: User absorbs Water-type attacks and has a weakness to Fire-type moves. Heals in rain and is damaged by sun.

effect_spore.name: Effect Spore
effect_spore.description: Induces paralysis, poison, or sleep on contact.

electric_surge.name: Electric Surge
electric_surge.description: The Pokémon creates an Electric Terrain when it enters a battle.

emergency_exit.name: Emergency Exit
emergency_exit.description: Switches out when HP falls below 50%.

fairy_aura.name: Fairy Aura
fairy_aura.description: Increases the power of all Fairy-type moves in battle to 1.3x.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: Reduces damage from super effective hits by 1/4.

flame_body.name: Flame Body
flame_body.description: Enemies' contact moves have a 30% chance to burn them. Halves the amount of steps required to hatch Eggs.

flare_boost.name: Flare Boost
flare_boost.description: Special Attack is increased by 50% when burned.

flash_fire.name: Flash Fire
flash_fire.description: Grants immunity to Fire and increases Fire's power 50% when hit by a Fire move.

flower_gift.name: Flower Gift
flower_gift.description: Raises Attack and Special Defense of this Pokemon and its partners in sun.

flower_veil.name: Flower Veil
flower_veil.description: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokemon's stats.

fluffy.name: Fluffy
fluffy.description: Halves damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.

forewarn.name: Forewarn
forewarn.description: Tells which of the opponent's moves has the highest Base Power.

friend_guard.name: Friend Guard
friend_guard.description: Reduces damage done to a teammate by 25%.

full_metal_body.name: Full Metal Body
full_metal_body.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

fur_coat.name: Fur Coat
fur_coat.description: Halves the damage done to this Pokemon by physical attacks.

gale_wings.name: Gale Wings
gale_wings.description: This Pokemon's Flying-type moves have their priority increased by 1.

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.description: Consumes pinch Berries at 50% HP or less.

gooey.name: Gooey
gooey.description: Contact with this Pokemon decreases the attacker's Speed by 1 stage.

grass_pelt.name: Grass Pelt
grass_pelt.description: This Pokemon's Defense is boosted by 50% in Grassy Terrain

grassy_surge.name: Grassy Surge
grassy_surge.description: The Pokémon creates a Grassy Terrain when it enters a battle.

grim_neigh.name: Grim Neigh
grim_neigh.description: Boosts Special Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

gulp_missile.name: Gulp Missile
gulp_missile.description: Returns with a catch in its mouth after using Surf or Dive.

guts.name: Guts
guts.description: Attack is increased 50% when afflicted by a non-volatile status.

harvest.name: Harvest
harvest.description: After each turn, the wielder may receive the Berry it used at a 50% chance (100% if in sun).

healer.name: Healer
healer.description: 30% chance to heal an adjacent teammate of a status condition every turn.

honey_gather.name: Honey Gather
honey_gather.description: Adds a chance of finding Honey after each in-game battle.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.description: Physical moves do 50% more damage at the cost of 20% accuracy. Increases wild encounter rate with higher level Pokemon.

hyper_cutter.name: Hyper Cutter
hyper_cutter.description: Prevents the enemy from lowering this Pokemon's Attack. Increases Cut's area of effect.

ice_body.name: Ice Body
ice_body.description: Heals 1/16 of max HP in hail.

ice_face.name: Ice Face
ice_face.description: Avoids damage from Physical moves for one turn.

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.description: Increases wild encounter rate (no effect in battles).

illusion.name: Illusion
illusion.description: The wielder appears as the last Pokemon in the party to the opponent.

imposter.name: Imposter
imposter.description: The wielder transforms into the opponent when it switches in.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: The wielder bypasses the foe's Light Screen, Reflect, Mist, Safeguard, and Substitute.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.description: Lowers the foe's Attack by 1 stage. Decreases wild encounter rate.

iron_barbs.name: Iron Barbs
iron_barbs.description: Deals 1/8 recoil damage when the opponent makes contact.

iron_fist.name: Iron Fist
iron_fist.description: Increases the power of punching moves by 20%.

justified.name: Justified
justified.description: Raises Attack by one stage when hit by a Dark-type move.

keen_eye.name: Keen Eye
keen_eye.description: Pokemon's accuracy cannot be lowered. Opponent's evasion boosts are ignored. Decreases wild encounter rate.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.description: This Pokemon both is unaffected by and will not utilize held items.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.description: This Pokemon is immune to Ground-type moves.

libero.name: Libero
libero.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

lightning_rod.name: Lightning Rod
lightning_rod.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

lightningrod.name: Lightningrod
lightningrod.description: All Electric-type attacks target this Pokemon. Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move.

liquid_ooze.name: Liquid Ooze
liquid_ooze.description: Leeching moves cause the enemy to lose HP instead.

liquid_voice.name: Liquid Voice
liquid_voice.description: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

long_reach.name: Long Reach
long_reach.description: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

magician.name: Magician
magician.description: If this Pokemon is not holding an item, it steals the held item of a target it hits with a move.

magma_armor.name: Magma Armor
magma_armor.description: Cannot be frozen. Halves the amount of steps required to hatch Eggs.

magnet_pull.name: Magnet Pull
magnet_pull.description: Prevents Steel-type Pokemon from switching. Increases the chance of encountering a Steel-type Pokemon in the wild.

marvel_scale.name: Marvel Scale
marvel_scale.description: Boosts Defense 50% when afflicted by a non-volatile status.

mega_launcher.name: Mega Launcher
mega_launcher.description: Boosts the power of Aura and Pulse moves, such as Aura Sphere and Dark Pulse, by 50%.

merciless.name: Merciless
merciless.description: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

minus.name: Minus
minus.description: If allied with a Pokemon with Plus or Minus, its Special Attack increases by 50%.

misty_surge.name: Misty Surge
misty_surge.description: The Pokémon creates a Misty Terrain when it enters a battle.

mold_breaker.name: Mold Breaker
mold_breaker.description: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified.

moody.name: Moody
moody.description: A random stat is lowered by 1 stage and another is boosted by 2 stages every turn.

motor_drive.name: Motor Drive
motor_drive.description: Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Speed by 1 stage when hit by a Electric-type move.

moxie.name: Moxie
moxie.description: Boosts Attack by 1 stage if the wielder knocks out another Pokemon.

multiscale.name: Multiscale
multiscale.description: Reduces damage by 50% if the wielder is at full health.

multitype.name: Multitype
multitype.description: Type changes depending on the held plate. Prevents item loss.

mummy.name: Mummy
mummy.description: The opponent's ability becomes Mummy when it hits the wielder with a contact move.

no_guard.name: No Guard
no_guard.description: All attacks used by and used on this Pokemon will never miss.

normalize.name: Normalize
normalize.description: All moves used by this Pokemon become Normal-type.

oblivious.name: Oblivious
oblivious.description: Grants immunity to infatuation, Captivate, and Taunt.

overcoat.name: Overcoat
overcoat.description: Grants immunity to damage from weather effects and powder moves.

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.description: Raises the power of Grass-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

parental_bond.name: Parental Bond
parental_bond.description: Allows the Pokemon to hit twice with the same move in one turn. Second hit has 0.5x base power. Does not affect Status, multihit, self-KO, or spread moves (in doubles).

perish_body.name: Perish Body
perish_body.description: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.description: The wielder immediately steals an item from an attacker using a contact move.

pickup.name: Pickup
pickup.description: If the wielder has no held item, it gets the last item consumed at the end of the turn. Adds a chance of finding an item after each battle.

pixilate.name: Pixilate
pixilate.description: Turns all of this Pokemon's Normal-typed attacks into Fairy-type and deals 1.3x damage. Does not affect Hidden Power.

plus.name: Plus
plus.description: If allied with a Pokemon with Plus or Minus, its Special Attack increases by 50%.

poison_heal.name: Poison Heal
poison_heal.description: Heals 1/8 of max HP per turn when poisoned.

poison_point.name: Poison Point
poison_point.description: Enemies' contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning them.

poison_touch.name: Poison Touch
poison_touch.description: The wielder's contact moves gain a 30% chance to poison the opponent.

power_spot.name: Power Spot
power_spot.description: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

prankster.name: Prankster
prankster.description: Non-damaging moves have their priority increased by one level.

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.description: Enemy attacks lose 1 extra PP. Increases wild encounter rate.

primordial_sea.name: Primordial Sea
primordial_sea.description: Summons Heavy Rain until Pokemon leaves battle. Fire-type moves and weather changing moves/abilities fail, except for Desolate Land and Delta Stream.

propeller_tail.name: Propeller Tail
propeller_tail.description: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

protean.name: Protean
protean.description: Right before this Pokemon uses a move, it changes its type to match that move. Hidden Power is interpreted as its Hidden Power type, rather than Normal.

psychic_surge.name: Psychic Surge
psychic_surge.description: The Pokémon creates a Psychic Terrain when it enters a battle.

punk_rock.name: Punk Rock
punk_rock.description: Boosts sound-based moves and halves damage from the same moves.

quick_feet.name: Quick Feet
quick_feet.description: Increases Speed by 50% when afflicted with a status condition.

rain_dish.name: Rain Dish
rain_dish.description: Heals 1/16 of max HP in rain.

rattled.name: Rattled
rattled.description: Raises Speed one stage when hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type move.

receiver.name: Receiver
receiver.description: Inherits an ally's ability when it faints.

reckless.name: Reckless
reckless.description: Increases the power of recoil moves by 20%.

refrigerate.name: Refrigerate
refrigerate.description: Turns all of this Pokemon's Normal-typed attacks into Ice-typed and deal 1.3x damage. Does not affect Hidden Power.

regenerator.name: Regenerator
regenerator.description: Wielder heals 1/3 of its maximum HP on switching out.

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.description: Raises move power by 25% if the opponent has the same gender, and reduces by 25% if the opponent has the opposite gender. Genderless Pokemon do not affect this ability.

rks_system.name: RKS System
rks_system.description: Changes type depending on held item.

rough_skin.name: Rough Skin
rough_skin.description: Deals 1/8 recoil damage when the opponent makes contact.

run_away.name: Run Away
run_away.description: Increases the chance of successfully escaping battle with a wild Pokemon.

sand_force.name: Sand Force
sand_force.description: Increases power of Ground-, Rock-, and Steel-type attacks by 30% in a sandstorm.

sand_spit.name: Sand Spit
sand_spit.description: Creates a sandstorm when hit by an attack.

sand_veil.name: Sand Veil
sand_veil.description: Evasion increases by 20% in a sandstorm.

sap_sipper.name: Sap Sipper
sap_sipper.description: Grants immunity to Grass-type moves and boosts Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Grass-type move.

scrappy.name: Scrappy
scrappy.description: Can hit Ghost-types with Fighting- and Normal-type moves.

screen_cleaner.name: Screen Cleaner
screen_cleaner.description: Nullifies effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.

serene_grace.name: Serene Grace
serene_grace.description: This Pokemon's secondary effect chances are doubled.

shadow_shield.name: Shadow Shield
shadow_shield.description: Reduces damage when HP is full.

shadow_tag.name: Shadow Tag
shadow_tag.description: Traps opponents. Does not affect Pokemon with Shadow Tag.

sheer_force.name: Sheer Force
sheer_force.description: Increases power of moves with secondary effects by 30%, but removes the effects.

shields_down.name: Shields Down
shields_down.description: Changes stats when HP drops below half.

simple.name: Simple
simple.description: Doubles the effect of stat boosts and drops.

skill_link.name: Skill Link
skill_link.description: Multi-hit moves will always hit the maximum number of times.

slow_start.name: Slow Start
slow_start.description: Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.

slush_rush.name: Slush Rush
slush_rush.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: Critical hits do 2.25x damage instead of 1.5x.

solar_power.name: Solar Power
solar_power.description: Loses 10% HP in sun each turn. Special Attack increases by 50%.

solid_rock.name: Solid Rock
solid_rock.description: Reduces damage from super effective hits by 1/4.

soul_heart.name: Soul-Heart
soul_heart.description: Raises Special Attack when another Pokémon faints.

speed_boost.name: Speed Boost
speed_boost.description: Speed raises at end of turn.

stakeout.name: Stakeout
stakeout.description: Deals double damage to Pokémon switching in.

stalwart.name: Stalwart
stalwart.description: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

stance_change.name: Stance Change
stance_change.description: Only affects Aegislash. If this Pokemon uses a Physical or Special move, it changes to Blade forme. If this Pokemon uses King's Shield, it changes to Shield forme.

static.name: Static
static.description: Enemies' contact moves can paralyze them.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.description: Speed is boosted one stage when flinched.

steam_engine.name: Steam Engine
steam_engine.description: Drastically raises Speed when hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

steely_spirit.name: Steely Spirit
steely_spirit.description: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.

stench.name: Stench
stench.description: Adds a 10% flinch chance for moves that do not have one. Decreases wild encounter rate.

sticky_hold.name: Sticky Hold
sticky_hold.description: This Pokemon's item cannot be removed. Increases the chance of encountering Pokemon while fishing.

storm_drain.name: Storm Drain
storm_drain.description: All Water-type attacks target this Pokemon. Grants immunity to Water-type moves and boosts Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Water-type move.

strong_jaw.name: Strong Jaw
strong_jaw.description: This Pokemon receives a 50% power boost for jaw attacks such as Bite and Crunch.

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.description: The wielder cannot be KO'd in one hit. OHKO moves will fail.

suction_cups.name: Suction Cups
suction_cups.description: Cannot be forced to switch. Increases chance of encountering Pokemon while fishing.

super_luck.name: Super Luck
super_luck.description: Critical hit rate increases one stage.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.description: Boosts power of Bug-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

sweet_veil.name: Sweet Veil
sweet_veil.description: Prevents allies from being put to Sleep.

symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
symbiosis.description: This Pokemon immediately passes its item to an ally after their item is consumed.

synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.description: When statused, the enemy is also statused. Can pass nature to wild Pokemon.

technician.name: Technician
technician.description: Increases power of moves with 60 base power or less by 50%.

telepathy.name: Telepathy
telepathy.description: Does not take damage from allies' attacks.

teravolt.name: Teravolt
teravolt.description: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.description: Boosts power of Water-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

tough_claws.name: Tough Claws
tough_claws.description: This Pokemon's contact attacks do 1.33x damage.

toxic_boost.name: Toxic Boost
toxic_boost.description: Attack is increased by 50% when poisoned.

truant.name: Truant
truant.description: This Pokemon does nothing every other turn.

turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
turboblaze.description: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.description: Ignores stat boosts and debuffs on other Pokemon.

unburden.name: Unburden
unburden.description: Speed increases when an item is used or lost.

unnerve.name: Unnerve
unnerve.description: Prevents the foe from consuming its held Berry item.

unseen_fist.name: Unseen Fist
unseen_fist.description: Contact moves can strike through Protect/Detect.

victory_star.name: Victory Star
victory_star.description: Increases the accuracy of the wielder and allies on its side of the field by 10%.

vital_spirit.name: Vital Spirit
vital_spirit.description: Prevents sleep. Increases wild encounters with higher level Pokemon.

volt_absorb.name: Volt Absorb
volt_absorb.description: Heals 25% HP when hit by an Electric-type attack.

wandering_spirit.name: Wandering Spirit
wandering_spirit.description: Swaps abilities with opponents on contact.

water_absorb.name: Water Absorb
water_absorb.description: Heals 25% HP when hit by a Water-type attack.

water_bubble.name: Water Bubble
water_bubble.description: Halves damage from Fire-type moves, doubles power of Water-type moves used, and prevents burns.

water_compaction.name: Water Compaction
water_compaction.description: Sharply raises Defense when hit by a Water-type move.

weak_armor.name: Weak Armor
weak_armor.description: Boosts Speed by 1 stage and lowers Defense by 1 stage when hit by a Physical move.

white_smoke.name: White Smoke
white_smoke.description: Prevents the enemy from lowering this Pokemon's stats and decreases wild encounter rate.

wimp_out.name: Wimp Out
wimp_out.description: Switches out when HP drops below half.

wonder_guard.name: Wonder Guard
wonder_guard.description: Only super effective attacks harm this Pokemon.

wonder_skin.name: Wonder Skin
wonder_skin.description: Reduces the accuracy of a status move to 50%.

zen_mode.name: Zen Mode
zen_mode.description: The wielder changes forme when below 50% of its max HP.
